page.title: 10Social Survey (Employment)
page.content:
There is no unemployment within the survey sample, although there may be some in the area as a whole.
In this traditional farming area only {10%}of the sample are agricultural workers. The majority{65%}are in some form of professional employment. {13%}of the sample are employed in the Armed Forces.{2%}are self- employed.
Only{5%}of the sample work in the village;{75%}work within a radius of 15 miles from home;{10%}have travelling jobs; the remaining{10%} work further afield, including London/ Europe and North Sea / Middle East. { {49%}of the sample have a secondary wage earner, predominently part-time.
